alert.note: Alert for Branch; Hillsdale (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 6:12PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Steuben, southeastern Branch, southwestern Hillsdale and northwestern Williams Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 612 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fremont, or 9 miles northeast of Angola, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Angola around 630 PM EDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 351 and 357. Interstate 69 in Michigan between mile markers 1 and 4. Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 142 and 156. Interstate 80 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 1. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
